Ski USA Heavenly California - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Ski USA Heavenly Lake Tahoe, California With the most expansive terrain in Tahoe, Heavenly Mountain Resort offers endless adventure for skiers and boarders alike. Explore hidden glades, two terrain parks, and wide-open groomed trails—all with breathtaking views of stunning Lake Tahoe. Covering 4,630 acres, with 97 runs ranging from mellow cruisers to steep chutes, Heavenly ski runs are 80% intermediate level of skier, so there's loads of super groomed blue runs. For those in your group who don’t ski, Lake Tahoe is a beautiful winter destination with activities for everyone. South Lake Tahoe, famous for its world-class ski resorts like Heavenly, is also known for its vibrant après-ski scene. You’ll find exceptional dining, shopping, luxury spas, casino resorts, and lively nightlife. Non-skiers can enjoy the scenic 3.8km Heavenly Gondola ride, offering unforgettable panoramic views of Lake Tahoe and dining at the top. Or, for a different kind of adventure, cruise across the crystal-clear waters of Lake Tahoe—a perfect way to spend a day off the slopes.
